UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relation of human beta-defensin 3: influence of disulfide bonds and cysteine substitution on antimicrobial activity and cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Klüver E, Schulz-Maronde S, Scheid S, Meyer B, Forssmann WG, Adermann K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=>200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 681(MIC=>300µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1128(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae DSM 11865(MIC=>300µg/ml)
